WW_Relics:Defend_Weakest.NAME: Weakest Block
WW_Relics:Defend_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:Strike_Weakest.NAME: Weakest Strike
WW_Relics:Strike_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestEnergyBlast.NAME: Weakest Energy Blast
WW_Relics:WeakestEnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1/3 ww_relics:Potential.  NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestFlyingKick.NAME: Weakest Flying Kick
WW_Relics:WeakestFlyingKick.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestProvocation.NAME: Weakest Provocation
WW_Relics:WeakestProvocation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain 1/3 ww_relics:Potential. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestTaunt.NAME: Weakest Taunt
WW_Relics:WeakestTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Gain 1/3 ww_relics:Potential. NL Ethereal.
